page.title: 01 SUMMARY
page.content: Rural, agricultural area. Much wildlife in natural environment. Dairy and mixed farming. 60% woodlands and plantations. On clay, sandstone, Ashdown sand and greensand. Fifteen different farms. Strong sense of nature conservation. Little residential coverage. Settlements:- Danehill and Chelwood Common. Three parishes - Danehill, Nutley and Fletching. Terrain:- Wealden ridges and vallies. Much of our area inaccessible by road. Most buildings of local materials. Dormitory area, many commuters to London. Some local employment. Some historical buildings. Little industry. Main drainage Ouse. Religion predominantly protestant. Not deeply religious area. No great tourist attractions. Generally friendly and co-operative atmosphere.
